desc: GJs Fabric Range includes: Glitter & Dance, Patchwork & Craft, Fashion Fabrics etc. GJs also has a large range of Haberdashery items. With over 25 years experience in the fabric industry we pride ourselves in the knowledge and understanding of costume making, dress making & patchwork. Sewing classes, fashion students.
